00027 namespace boost {
00028 namespace xint {
00029 namespace detail {
00030 
00031 BOOST_XINT_INLINE data_t& data_t::operator&=(const data_t n) {
00032     size_t len = (std::min)(length, n.length);
00033     beginmod(len);
00034 
00035     const digit_t *ns = n.digits(), *nse = ns + len;
00036     digit_t *t = digits();
00037     while (ns != nse) *t++ &= *ns++;
00038     length = len;
00039 
00040     endmod();
00041     return *this;
00042 }
00043 
00044 BOOST_XINT_INLINE data_t& data_t::operator|=(const data_t n) {
00045     size_t len = (std::max)(length, n.length);
00046     beginmod(len);
00047 
00048     if (length > n.length) {
00049         const digit_t *ns = n.digits(), *nse = ns + n.length;
00050         digit_t *t = digits();
00051         while (ns != nse) *t++ |= *ns++;
00052     } else {
00053         const digit_t *ns = n.digits(), *nse = ns + len;
00054         digit_t *t = digits(), *te = t + length;
00055         while (t != te) *t++ |= *ns++;
00056         while (ns != nse) *t++ = *ns++;
00057         length = len;
00058     }
00059 
00060     endmod();
00061     return *this;
00062 }
00063 
00064 BOOST_XINT_INLINE data_t& data_t::operator^=(const data_t n) {
00065     size_t len = (std::max)(length, n.length);
00066     beginmod(len);
00067 
00068     if (length > n.length) {
00069         const digit_t *ns = n.digits(), *nse = ns + n.length;
00070         digit_t *t = digits();
00071         while (ns != nse) *t++ ^= *ns++;
00072     } else {
00073         const digit_t *ns = n.digits(), *nse = ns + len;
00074         digit_t *t = digits(), *te = t + length;
00075         while (t != te) *t++ ^= *ns++;
00076         while (ns != nse) *t++ = *ns++;
00077         length = len;
00078     }
00079 
00080     endmod();
00081     return *this;
00082 }
00083 
00084 BOOST_XINT_INLINE data_t operator&(const data_t n1, const data_t n2) {
00085     return data_t(n1) &= n2;
00086 }
00087 
00088 BOOST_XINT_INLINE data_t operator|(const data_t n1, const data_t n2) {
00089     return data_t(n1) |= n2;
00090 }
00091 
00092 BOOST_XINT_INLINE data_t operator^(const data_t n1, const data_t n2) {
00093     return data_t(n1) ^= n2;
00094 }
